attributes.action: Say No to Somali country’s  division.
attributes.additional_details: Somali people would like the British politicians not to interfere the Somali country’s affairs and its sovereignty. This campaign will be seen as new colonial approach trying to divide and rule Somalia. The latest campaign led by Gavin William MP has angered over 300,000 Somali diaspora in UK. By continuing this campaign can bring unrest between the Somali community in the UK which can lead violence. Also, this will increase the mistrust and alienation of the Somali diaspora in the UK.
attributes.background: There’re British politicians who’re campaigning to divide Somali country according to the British colonial era. Majority of Somali people are against this and seeing this that the British government is bringing back their colonial system.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about foreign policy regarding Somaliland, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, or not do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Don't recognise 'Somaliland' as an independent state: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606842
